# MediaMarktSaturn Technology

![hack](https://assets.mmsrg.com/isr/166325/c1/-/ms-cms-sede-l15862394/feecms_x_x_x)

(Source: <https://www.saturn.de/de/shop/xperion.html/>)

As Europe‚Äôs biggest consumer electronics retailer, the MediaMarktSaturn Retail Group believes in making use of technology in the best sense for our customers.

MediaMarktSaturn Technology provides the foundation for this. We are the driving force behind our omnichannel platform with more than a thousand MediaMarkt, MediaWorld and Saturn stores throughout Europe as well as a growing online business.

## Our core values

### We focus on people üôå

We are people who actively shape the future of our company. We strive to contribute to our companies success through our ideas, passion and great team spirit.

### We love challenges ‚òÆÔ∏è

We love challenges. Applying the newest technologies and trends to provide the best solutions to our customers - that‚Äôs what drives us.

### We support each other üèãÔ∏è‚Äç‚ôÇÔ∏è

We work in diverse teams and always aim to find the best solutions together. Supporting team members is important to us.

## Why join?

### Flexibility ‚Ü©Ô∏è

Working at MediaMarktSaturn Technology means enriching people's lives with countless opportunities - including yours. With a variety of offers for childcare, care of relatives and opportunities for flexible work in place and time, we help you to balance your family and career according to your needs.

### Modern equipment üíª, environment and hybrid working üë®‚Äçüíªüßë‚Äçüíª

At MediaMarktSaturn Technology, we make sure that you feel right at home in the team while you're working and that you have the technical equipment you need to make your contribution on shaping the future in retail with us, no matter if you work from home or from one of our locations.

### Professional development and growth üìà

Learning new things, constantly developing and having the freedom to think outside the box - these are the ingredients for both innovation and job satisfaction. We are constantly improving our organization and ourselves. This ensures our long-term success as a technology leader in retail and promotes your further development. Therefore, giving feedback is of extremely important to us. We support you with individual development plans and a variety of internal and external trainings in our Tech University.

## TECH TALENTS WANTED!

The MediaMarktSaturn Retail Group is Europe‚Äôs biggest consumer electronics retailer. Together with you, we‚Äôre determined to enrich the digital lives of our customers. After all, we‚Äôre already in touch with them about 6 million times a day!

Are you familiar with terms like Scrum, DevOps and API? Do you know what Product Teams do ‚Äì and does Sprint mean more to you than simply running for the bus?!

Above all, do you feel like working with the very latest technology?

If so, it‚Äôs time we get to know each other!

MediaMarktSaturn Technology is all about agile working, cool teams with pleasant colleagues, a relaxed, informal atmosphere, and loads of fun!

### JOIN US NOW üî•

Catched your interest ? What are you waiting for ? [Join us now !](https://mms.tech/)

Interested in other options across the MediaMarktSaturn Retail Group ? [Have a look here !](https://www.mediamarktsaturn.com/en/career-mediamarktsaturn)
